content: k3 p3 to the end of the round to complete the left-leaning 3x3 cable final band slip the next three sts onto a cable needle and cast off all the sts continuing to work in rib as hold at the front of the work k3 from the left you cast off needle as normal then k3 from the cable needle finishing right-leaning 3x3 cable weave loose ends into the back of the work slip the next three sts onto a cable needle and using a darning needle hold at the back of the work k3 from the left gently wash in warm water with wool wash needle as normal then k3 from the cable gently wring before pressing between towels to needle remove water lie flat on dry towel forming into the correct dimensions leave in shade to dry completely 2 | © kiniki knits 2026
